item.title: The five headlth benefits of jumping rope
item.description: Jumping rope is one of the most underrated types of exercise â€” and it may even be more effective than other forms of cardio.

item.title: The health benefits of Yoga
item.description: What Facts Should I Know about Yoga? Yoga is a systematic practice of physical exercise, breath control, relaxation, diet control, and positive thinking and meditation aimed at developing harmony in the body, mind, and environment.
